channel.title: Homes on Aryan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Aryan's website

item.description: Biography I’m a Fullstack System design engineer. I work on things related to electronics, such as circuit designing, digital designing, verilog coding, designing products which can house these beautiful electronics.. yeah that’s what I do as professional. As a hobbbyist I do much more than these things. As we all know necessity is the mother of invention, I strongly believe that we engineers are here to solve the real life problems not to create one.

item.title: Recent Posts
item.description: A Free workshop on Open source electronics - 21 July 2019 I conducted a workshop on open source electronics to 11th standard students at my almamater Viveka Pre University College, Kota, Udupi. The response was very good, students started giving life to their innovative ideas with the help of arduino microcontroller. Some even won awards at project exhibition competitions organised by nearby engineering colleges. LoRa - Long range Communication for IoT Traction: My work got featured in Deccan Herald News Paper

item.title: Projects
item.description: VLIW ARCHITECTURE DESIGN IMPLEMENTATION Apr 2017 â€“ May 2017 Designed VLIW architecture supporting multiple formats of instructions. Modified the design for Hazard Detection and Forwarding Units for the multiple set of instructions involved. Performed behavioral simulations and verification of the design using Xilinx ISE. FPGA DESIGN Jan 2017 - Mar 2017 Designed and implemented an FPGA which utilizes a 4 input LUT and 5 bit bidirectional channel width in Verilog HDL.

item.title: Extra Curricular Activities
item.description: Core member of Bits Goa Basketball Team, won runner up at Bits Hyderabad College Fest. Represented the college in various Goa Tournaments. Passionate Ultimate Frisbee Player

item.title: Position of Responsibilty
item.description: Event Manager, Spree 2016 Worked directly with Event Management and organised the Basketball matches in College fest - Spree 2016. Formulated effective management of resources and scheduling of matches.
